吽字的基本解释

吽
hǒu
古同“吼”。

吽
hōng
佛教咒语用字。

吽
ōu
〔吽牙〕狗争斗的声音。亦作“吽呀”。

吽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［óu］
［《集韻》魚侯切，平矦，疑。］
亦作“呍1”。
见“吽牙”、“吽呀”。
[②]［hǒu］
［《廣韻》呼后切，上厚，曉。］
同“吼1”。
(1)牛鸣。
(2)怒吼；高叫。
[③]［hōng］
［《字彙補》曉東切］
梵语Hum的译音。佛教“六字真言”之一。

吽字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　吽； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页180第02
【字彙】同吼。　又【集韻】於今切，音隂。【玉篇】牛鳴也。　又【集韻】魚侯切，音齵。【前漢·東方朔傳】狋吽牙者，兩犬爭也。【註】吽，五侯反。　又【正字通】梵呪多用吽字。　又叶職容切，音鐘。【張昱輦下曲】守內番僧日念吽，御㕑酒肉按時供。叶下重。

Hum

[Fangs] the sound of dogs fighting. Also known as "Humah".
Hum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [óu]
["Jiyun" Yuhou cut, flat, suspicious. ]
Also known as "呍1".
See "Hang Ya" and "Hang Ya".
[②] [hǒu]
["Guangyun" cut after the call, thick, Xiao. ]
Same as "Roar 1".
(1) Niu Ming.
(2) Roaring; shouting.
[③] [hōng]
[Xiaodong cut in "Zihuibu"]
Transliteration of Sanskrit Hum. One of the "six-character mantra" of Buddhism.
Hum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Moral Department] 　吽; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 180 02
【Vocabulary】The same roar.　 [Ji Yun] cut in Jin, Yin Yin. [Jade articles] Niu Ming also.　[Jiyun] Yuhou cuts, sound is dilapidated. [Previous Han·Dongfang Shuo Biography] Those who croak their teeth, two dogs compete. [Note] Hum, Wuhou is against.　[Zhengzitong] Fanyu often uses the word "Hum".　Ye Zhi Rong Qi again, sound the bell. [Zhang Yuqin's next song] Shou Nei Fan monk chants on the day, and Yu 㕑 wine and meat are offered on time. Leaf under the weight.
